category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMAutoPSPClassIDs
preference.preference_description: Contains class IDs for which the Propagation Start Point (PSP) will be set automatically. In Active Workspace there is a functionality that sets the PSP automatically to the right component, when a new component is added to an assembly. Only if the component - that should get the PSP - is classified in one class that is present in this preference or in one of their child classes, the PSP will be set automatically.
